value.title: ZenRobotics
value.excerpt: ZenRobotics is the world‚Äôs leading supplier of robotic waste separation technology. If waste sorting was invented today, everyone would put robots on the job. That‚Äôs because robots provide a new, more efficient solution to an old problem. Robotic waste separation will revolutionize the waste processing industry the same way that industrial robots changed the automotive industry. Only a lot smarter.

topItems.title: Clarifai
topItems.excerpt: Clarifai is headquartered in New York City and was founded in 2013 by Matthew Zeiler to bring the world‚Äôs best image recognition technology to market. Our first image recognition systems held the top 5 spots for classifying objects in images in the ImageNet 2013 competition. Since then Clarifai‚Äôs deep learning systems have improved orders of magnitude in speed, vocabulary size, memory footprint and have expanded beyond images to extract knowledge from all forms of data.

topItems.title: Enlitic
topItems.excerpt: Enlitic is shaping the next generation of diagnostic healthcare tools to help patients around the globe. By using AI and deep learning, we help Radiologists identify diseases and medical issues (e.g cancers and tumors) more accurately and earlier. We believe we are working on one of the biggest social impact opportunities in healthcare and are deploying our technology around the globe in areas that lack proper specialists, helping patients get diagnosed quickly with more accuracy.

Since 2008, the company has applied its patented capabilities to serving media-related industries, including advertising and professional sports.

value.title: Alegion
value.excerpt: Alegion has the most powerful and flexible annotation platform for training data in market. It accelerates model development for the most sophisticated and subjective use cases. value.title: Built Robotics
value.excerpt: Built Robotics‚Äô mission is to build the robots that build the world. By upgrading off-the-shelf heavy equipment with AI guidance systems, Built‚Äôs technology enables machines to operate fully autonomously. Built‚Äôs robots are deployed today across the $1 trillion earthmoving industry, and they‚Äôre being used to build critical infrastructure such as wind farms, gas pipelines, and new housing developments.

value.title: Clarify Health Solutions
value.excerpt: Clarify Health provides the breakthrough technology and analytics platform to personalize and optimize patient care journeys. Our purpose-built solutions - developed by a world-class team of data scientists and engineers from the financial services industry, top clinical operations experts, and logistics specialists - are transforming healthcare processes and workflows. Clarify delivers actionable insights that enable physicians, health systems, payers, and life sciences organizations to deliver better care today and evolve for a value-based world.

Its collaborative end-to-end solution enables companies to accelerate innovation and build high impact machine learning models. From Fortune 500 companies to startups, cnvrg.io helps data scientists solve complex problems, by building intelligent machines. The platform is used across industries by leading companies in finance, gaming, BI, automotive, manufacturing, e-commerce and more.

value.title: Invoca
value.excerpt: Invoca is an AI-powered call tracking and conversational analytics company that brings the depth of marketing analytics traditionally limited to digital consumer interactions to the world of human-to-human selling. With Invoca, marketers can use real-time call and conversational analytics to maximize the return of their paid media campaigns in Google and Facebook, and improve the buying experience by enriching customer profiles in Salesforce and Adobe Experience Cloud. With Fortune 500 customers and deep partnerships with the technologies marketers use every day, Invoca has raised $116M from leading venture capitalists including Accel, Upfront Ventures, H.I.G. Growth Partners, Morgan Stanley, and Salesforce Ventures. For more information, visit www.invoca.com.

value.title: Liulishuo
value.excerpt: Founded by Yi Wang, Hui Lin and Ben Hu in 2012, Liulishuo is the world's leading "AI + Education"‚Äã company. The Company has developed the world's first ‚ÄúAI English Teacher‚Äù based on deep learning, which provides a personalized and adaptive learning path for every learner. It is proven to triple the learning efficiency (reduce the required learning time to one third) compared to human teachers by CEFR (Common European Framework of Reference for Language) standards, according to a study using the TOEIC Bridge Test from ETS.

value.title: Pymetrics
value.excerpt: Founded by Harvard/MIT-trained PhDs, pymetrics uses neuroscience data and AI to help global clients like Unilever, Accenture and LinkedIn make their hiring and internal mobility more predictive and less biased. pymetrics replaces the resume as a first-pass filter by assessing candidates based on their true potential -- their inherent cognitive and emotional make-up. Using algorithms that are trained on high-performing employees at a company, pymetrics builds a trait profile of a company's top performers to select best fit talent. These algorithms are then audited to remove any gender or ethnic bias. pymetrics also serves as a common application for candidates, ensuring that everyone finds their best-fit job, regardless of where they apply. With over 80 enterprise clients and offices in NYC, London, Sydney and Singapore, pymetrics is powering the future of hiring: efficient, predictive, and bias-free.

value.title: Rulai
value.excerpt: Silicon Valley-based Rulai delivers AI virtual customer assistance that reduces sales and support costs, increases sales conversion rates and improves customer experience with quick, always-available, chat-and SMS-based, human-like conversational engagement.  These smart agents, driven by Rulai Natural Language Understanding (NLU) and Deep Learning  technologies, enable brands to handle their growing customer interaction volume faster and more efficiently by answering customer questions,completing tasks and learning from live agent:customer interaction.  Rulai Virtual Assistance complements live support with seamless escalation to human agents when desired or required for more complex issue resolution. Rulai solutions are developed and supported by a team of award-winning computer scientists and engineers widely considered to be among the world‚Äôs leading experts in the field of Machine Learning. For more information please contact www.rul.ai.
